};"This dataset focuses on the employment of individuals by their place of work and by regions. The data is collected at the "Census Year" level and covers the territory types "State" and "Region". The dataset includes the following columns: "Ukazatel"

column2: the available value is "Počet obyvatel (obvyklý pobyt)".

column16: "Moravskoslezský kraj". The data for "Území" is organized hierarchically
column17: with "Česká republika" as the parent region encompassing all other regions.
